Ich finde das Spielprinzip gut. Man kann schnelle Runden Spielen, oder eben auch längere Matchmakings zu max.30 Runden / 90 Minuten. Geht aber in der Regel schneller. Die Grafik ist gut und die Steuerung mit ein wenig Übung auch sehr einfach.
valve wake up matchmakings full of cheaters

Your first few weeks playing CS:GO has a 90% chance of being terrible because of hackers and toxic people, 
BUT once you push through to Prime status, start understanding the game and the strategy and skill in the competitive side of the game YOU WILL FALL IN LOVE. This game provides something no other game offers. Third party Q'ing platforms are the way to go, less to no hackers and people there tend to play because they love the game too.

One of the best competitive shooters out there,an all time classic and favourite,one to fit many kinds of players whether they want to completely focus into the task at hand and win or just play with their friends and kick back.
Absolutely Recommended!

This game is by far the best game i have ever played on top of that it has amazing players and a great community other then the hackers you will find rarely but  since i am a  long time csgo player i thought it was time to finnally make my report on this game and now i know that it is AMAZING and that YOU SHOULD TRY IT why you  might ask well if you like battle royals it has 1 gamemode for that but  it also has  competitive 5v5
and a mode called wingman which is a unique 2v2 competitive where you can earn ranks.
the ranks are what make the game fun because the top goal for all csgo players  is global elite and after that you wanna reach for the stars and try and get money by going to tournaments!
Jeg synes det er et fedt spil! :)
